DOC.brief_summary: We want investigate early follicular phase downregulation androgen priming , use GnRH antagonist , aromatase inhibitor hCG COH short protocol , show sign improvement compare standard short antagonist protocol
DOC.brief_title: Short-Term Androgen Priming Before COS Using Aromatase Inhibitor hCG During Early-Follicular-Phase GnRH Antagonist Administration - Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Indication wish IVF/ICSI treatment Womens age 2039 year ( inclusive ) Regular menstrual cycle within normal range Body Mass Index : 1830 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Negative pregnancy test treatment A maximum 3 early IVF/ICSI treatment result pregnancy serious systemic disease Presence polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) Earlier poor response le 4 mature follicle Earlier participation investigation
